alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 3:28PM EDT until April 26 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Louisa County in central Virginia... The City of Richmond in central Virginia... North central Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Goochland County in central Virginia... Northwestern Henrico County in central Virginia... West central Hanover County in central Virginia... Powhatan County in central Virginia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 327 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gum Spring to near Trenholm, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Goochland and Gum Spring around 335 PM EDT. Powhatan around 340 PM EDT. Oilville around 345 PM EDT. Montpelier and Sabot around 355 PM EDT. Manakin and Wyndham around 400 PM EDT. Tuckahoe around 405 PM EDT. Richmond, Ashland, University Of Richmond, Bon Air, Glen Allen and Laurel around 415 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Crozier, Rock Castle, Vontay, Maidens, Three Square, Irwin, Johnsons Springs, Gilman, Fine Creek Mills and Michaux. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Louisa; Powhatan
